entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow late in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then north 30 gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast late in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Light snow and blowing snow ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 23 February 2023
